biography: Noor is a creator of immersive new realities. As an Extended Reality (XR) Designer, she designs experiences that blend the digital and physical worlds through virtual and augmented reality. She is a visionary artist and a skilled technician, with a deep understanding of human perception and interaction in 3D space. Her work is about more than just games; it's about creating new ways to learn, work, and connect.
